topic.title: Imposing a Fixed Set of Global Preferences

body.p: You may want to impose a fixed set of global options to be used by all end users who install the plugin. The GlobalOptionsStorage API allows to:

li.p: Set a certain global option to a certain value: . The APIAccessibleOptionTags interface contains a list with all keys which can be set to a custom value.

Set global options by importing an options XML file: . Such an options XML file can be generated by using the Oxygen main menu "Options->Export Global Options" action. A sample Javascript-based WorkspaceAccess plugin implementation which imports such an options XML document in the application can be found here: .
